snippet: Svetlana Alexievich, the recipient of the Nobel Prize for Literature, gave a bleak assessment of the political situation in Russia and her native Belarus to journalists on Saturday.
abstract: Svetlana Alexievich, 2015 Nobel Prize for Literature winner, offers cynical view of Eastern European politics, calling Belarusian election rigged and saying Russia is now living in dark times; nonfiction writer and Belarus resident says she expects her latest honor will have same non-affect on her government and its authorities as her previous ones did.
lead_paragraph: Svetlana Alexievich, the recipient of the Nobel Prize for Literature, gave a bleak assessment of the political situation in Russia and her native Belarus to journalists on Saturday.

headline.main: Nobel Writer Sees Politics Through Lens of Mistrust
headline.print_headline: Nobel Writer Sees Politics Through Lens of Mistrust
